targets.query: SELECT mean("leftTx") FROM "validators" WHERE ("address" =~ /^$validator_1$/ AND "chain" = 'foreign') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("leftTx") FROM "validators" WHERE ("address" =~ /^$validator_2$/ AND "chain" = 'foreign') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("leftTx") FROM "validators" WHERE ("address" =~ /^$validator_3$/ AND "chain" = 'foreign') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("leftTx") FROM "validators" WHERE ("chain" = 'foreign' AND "address" =~ /^$validator_1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Tokens balance  & bridge contracts deposit/withdrawals differences

targets.query: SELECT "address", "balance" FROM "validators" WHERE ("chain" = 'foreign') AND time > now() - 1m
SELECT "address", "balance" FROM "validators" WHERE ("chain" = 'home') AND time > now() - 1m
SELECT "requiredSignatures" FROM "validators_required_signatures" WHERE ("chain" = 'home') AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - 1m
